name: Amazement Attendant (Comica)
text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Set 1 "?ttraction" Trap directly from your Deck to your Spell & Trap Zone. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of your "?ttraction" Traps that is equipped to a monster; equip it to 1 "Amazement" monster you control or 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. You can only use this effect of "Amazement Attendant " once per turn.
